metadata.subject: How many degrees of separation between Trump and sex offender Epstein?

relationships.description: Article examines the connection between Trump and convicted sex offender Epstein

analysis.purpose: To investigate and report on the relationship between Donald Trump and Jeffrey Epstein
analysis.significance: Media examination of political and social connections to a convicted sex offender

blackmail_indicators.description: No evidence of blackmail or coercion in this news article

illegal_activity.description: This is a news article reporting on Epstein's criminal status and his connections, not first-hand evidence of illegal activity

details: Article by Jane Musgrave, Palm Beach Post staff writer

public_knowledge.context: This appears to be a publicly published news article from the Palm Beach Post examining the relationship between Donald Trump and Jeffrey Epstein, who was a convicted sex offender

analysis.summary: This is a news article from the Palm Beach Post investigating the connections between Donald Trump and convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein, written by staff writer Jane Musgrave and published on May 12, 2017.
